params.subscribe_blurb: One Last Wish is a modern day zine — an email newsletter. It's a musical love letter to my past, present, and future self.
params.about_blurb: One Last Wish is a modern day zine — an email newsletter. It’s a musical love letter to my past, present, and future self. Back in the 90s I was into making zines about the hardcore music scene. Today, email newsletters are filling that void. I’d love to do all that again, so here we are…
